content.text:
I'm ready! I'm Claude Code, your React + Living Apps specialist. I'm all set to:

- Build beautiful React frontends with TypeScript and Vite
- Use shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS with a rock-solid design system
- Integrate with Living Apps REST API for data persistence
- Create stunning, responsive UIs that make users say "Wow, das ist genau was ich brauche!"

I understand the critical rules:
- Design system first (index.css + tailwind.config.ts) - NO ad-hoc styling
- Semantic tokens only - NO text-white, bg-black, etc.
- Full CRUD with Living Apps when data persistence is needed
- Beautiful, functional first impression

Just tell me what you'd like to build, and I'll make it happen!
